alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Clarke; Decatur; Lucas; Madison; Marion; Ringgold; Union; Warren; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:25AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR LUCAS...DECATUR...SOUTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHWESTERN MARION... EASTERN UNION...WAYNE...EASTERN RINGGOLD...SOUTHWESTERN APPANOOSE... CLARKE AND SOUTHERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 724 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Macksburg to Lamoni, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Davis City around 730 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Leon, Decatur City, Pleasanton, Nine Eagles State Park, East Peru, Truro, St. Charles, St. Marys, Clio, Allerton, Indianola, Corydon, Lake Ahquabi State Park and Otter Creek County Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 52. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Clarke; Decatur; Lucas; Madison; Marion; Ringgold; Union; Warren; Wayne
